@coolasad: Thanks.
"Middle" was encoded when started, and upped regularly. But, as many short comedy shows wasn't accepted and was dropped out.
Practically - all short comedy shows are - as people say - "on me", maybe because people do not "see" savings in size, maybe because majority just stuff their pockets up and run away...

You DO realize that TV packs have 1400-2600 downloads - but only three or four seeders day after - and - for worse - only dozen people say Thanks.

Count for yourself, look around, and you'll see maybe two dozen of screen-names. Same people, day by day, and thousands of "mute" ones... (You used plural as "we" - if you wondering why such long answer).

And people should understand why am I such "pain in the ass" who refuse to include a show, but drop one very easily...

'Twould be nice if I knew how to access such stats.  I have attempted an initial seed for about a year of an xvid avi convrsion I made of Hopscotch--but bittorrent still says it is "initial seeding".  Anyway, as of this moment, I have 123 torrents, of which about half are unavailable due to temporary changes in Win7 external hard drive designations from adding an external DVD drive to my netbook.  Of those 60 or so torrents still available for download at any moment, 19 are 20-40 downloads.  Also at the moment, there are 9 active uploads, of which 6 are yours.  Not presently downloading anything.

Thank you for Friday Night Lights and Cougar Town.

@azrielle: You should have maximally 8 torrents loaded, and when you start downloading one - press Stop for all others (resume with  seeding only when download have finished).
Download max. two in the same time and do not seed other torrents during the download of some - they need (in download) all bandwidth you have.
